info.title: DBS Ticketing EAI API
info.description: Zammad vorgeschaltete EAI, über die die Kommunikation anderer Systeme mit Zammad abläuft. Has two subsets of API - one internal and one external. The external API are Endpoints that are exposed via API-Gateways to the internet,while the internal API is being used solely by internal services.

tags.name: Attachments
tags.description: Endpoints to receive Attachment-Data for downloading.

tags.name: Articles
tags.description: Reading and Creating Articles in Zammad.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Endpoints regarding the reading and creating of Users in Zammad.

externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation

tags.name: Organizations
tags.description: Reading and manipulating organizations in Zammad.

tags.name: Tickets
tags.description: Reading and Creating Tickets in Zammad.

get.summary: Find user in Zammad by lhmExtId.

put.summary: Update an existing User with new Data

post.summary: Create a new User (optionally with lhmExtId)
post.description:
Authorization: WRITE_USERS
Semantically, the presence of lhmExtId means that it is a registered citizen; the absence of lhmExtId means that the citizen is/was not registered.

put.summary: Add a person to an organization.

delete.summary: Remove a person from an organization.

post.description:
Customer must be identified by specifying lhmExtID in Header.
Exposes all available attributes.

Authorization: WRITE_TICKETS

parameters.name: lhmExtID
parameters.description: lhmExtID of customer must be set.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: One of lhmExtID or userId must be set.

post.summary: Create a new Article for a given Ticket.
post.description:
User can be identified  by lhmExtId, lhmObjectID OR userID. Anonymous access also possible.
Exposes all available attributes.

⚠ Internal Articles can only be created by users with at least an "Agent"-Role in Zammad. When giving a user-context, make sure the user has the appropriate rights.

Authorization: WRITE_TICKETS

post.summary: Create a new User and a corresponding Ticket for this new user.
post.description:
Exposes all available attributes.

Authorization: WRITE_TICKETS

get.description:
User must be identified  by lhmExtID OR lhmObjectID.
Exposes all available attributes.

Authorization: READ_TICKETS

parameters.description: One of lhmExtID or lhmObjectID must be set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the paged results.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of elements in one page.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort the results by.

get.summary: Get Attachment of given article id from given ticket id by given attachment id.
get.description: Receives the attachment with the ID attachmentID of the article articleID from the ticket ticketID and forwards it as a binary data stream.
